name: truestreak
description: Professional landing page showcasing React and React Native expertise

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:scss && npm run build:js && npm run optimize:images && npm run hash:assets && npm run build:html && npm run generate:sitemap && npm run generate:robots
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others --names "SCSS,JS,HTML,ASSETS,FIREBASE,BROWSER" -c "yellow,blue,green,magenta,cyan,red" "npm run watch:scss" "npm run watch:js" "npm run watch:html" "npm run watch:assets" "npm run serve" "npm run browser-sync"
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run dev
scripts.deploy: npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting:truestreak-landing
